pen Water is a 2003 film inspired by a true story about an American couple, Tom and Eileen Lonergan, who in 1998 went out with a scuba diving group, Outer Edge Dive Company, into the South Pacific. They were accidentally left behind due to a faulty head count taken by the dive-boat crew. There were 26 other divers and five crew members, all of whom failed to notice that the couple were not on board.
